products.name: Silk Embroidered Kurtha
products.subtitle: Maroon & Gold Collection
products.description: Exquisitely crafted silk kurtha featuring intricate gold embroidery along the neckline and sleeves. This timeless piece combines traditional artistry with contemporary elegance, perfect for festive occasions and celebrations.
details: Side slits for ease of movement

products.name: Royal Velvet Zari Detailed Kurtha
products.subtitle: Royal Heritage Collection
products.description: Luxurious velvet kurtha adorned with traditional zari work. The deep wine color paired with golden zari creates a regal aesthetic that embodies royal elegance Wedding.

products.name: Cotton Block Print Detailed Kurtha
products.subtitle: The Artisan Series
products.description: Handcrafted cotton kurtha featuring traditional block printing techniques. Each piece is unique, showcasing the skill of master artisans and sustainable fashion practices.

products.name: Georgette Kurtha with Sequins
products.subtitle: Celebration
products.description: Flowing georgette kurtha delicately embellished with hand-sewn sequins. The ethereal drape and shimmer make this piece perfect for evening celebrations.

products.name: Chanderi Floral Kurtha
products.subtitle: Garden Dreams Collection
products.description: Delicate Chanderi silk kurtha featuring subtle floral motifs woven into the fabric. The lightweight material and soft sheen create an effortlessly elegant look.

products.name: Brocade Royal Kurtha
products.subtitle: Heritage Luxe Collection
products.description: Statement brocade kurtha woven with metallic threads creating a magnificent jacquard pattern. This piece represents the pinnacle of traditional Indian textile artistry.

categories.name: Kurthas
categories.description: Elegant ethnic wear for the modern woman
